Function Documentation

BOOL Fooey_AddWidget ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_,
GUI_BASE_STRUCT *  pstWidget_,
UCHAR  ucGroup_,
UCHAR  eType_ 
)

Adds a widget to a Fooey GUI, initilizing and specializing the control based on the type of widget specified. Once associated with the GUI, it is managed automatcially.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - Pointer to the GUI manager base struct
pstWidget_ - Pointer to the widget to add to the managed GUI
ucGroup_ - The control group priority level for drawing (high = front, low = back)
eType_ - The control's type
Returns:
TRUE on success, FALSE if the GUI manager is full.
void Fooey_GetControlOffsets ( GUI_BASE_STRUCT *  pstWidget_,
USHORT *  pusX_,
USHORT *  pusY_ 
)

Determine the X/Y offsets of a widget relative to the root node in the display (usually a surface widget). Scans continuously until the base node is found.

Parameters:
pstWidget_ - pointer to the current widget
pusX_ - pointer where the X offset of the control will be returned
pusY_ - pointer where the Y offset of the control will be returned
void Fooey_InitDisplay ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_,
DISPLAY_DRIVER_STRUCT *  pstDisplay_,
FOOEY_EVENT_STRUCT *  pstEvents_,
UCHAR  ucNumEvents_,
GUI_BASE_STRUCT *  astWidgets_[],
USHORT  usNumWidgets_ 
)

Initializes an instance of a Fooey GUI.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - Pointer to the GUI manager base struct
pstDisplay_ - pointer to the display driver to use with this GUI instance
pstEvents_ - pointer to the events buffer for the UI
ucNumEvents_ - Number of events in the events buffer
astWidgets_ - Array of pointers to the widgets managed in this UI
usNumWidgets_ - Number of elements in this instance
void Fooey_InitWidget ( GUI_BASE_STRUCT *  pstWidget_  ) 

Initialize a widget that has been added to a GUI manager

Parameters:
pstWidget_ - pointer to the current widget
void Fooey_ProcessEvents ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_  ) 

Processes all queued events in the GUI manager's event buffer.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - pointer to the GUI manager containing the controls
BOOL Fooey_RemoveWidget ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_,
GUI_BASE_STRUCT *  pstWidget_ 
)

Removes a widget from a Fooey GUI. Once a control is removed, it is no longer managed by the GUI.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - Pointer to the GUI manager base struct
pstWidget_ - Pointer to the widget to remove from the managed GUI
Returns:
TRUE on success, FALSE if the widget is not found
void Fooey_RenderAll ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_  ) 

Renders (draws) all GUI elements associated with a UI from lowest group to highest group. Resets the "bRedraw" property of each control afterward.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - pointer to the GUI manager containing the controls to render
void Fooey_RenderChanged ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_  ) 

Renders (draws) all of the GUI elements associated with the UI that have their bRedraw property set to TRUE.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - pointer to the GUI manager containing the controls to render
void Fooey_ResetFocus ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_  ) 

Resets the focus to false for all controls managed by a current UI manager struct.

Parameters:
pstManager_ - pointer to the GUI manager struct
BOOL Fooey_SendEvent ( GUI_MANAGER_STRUCT *  pstManager_,
FOOEY_EVENT_STRUCT *  pstEvent_ 
)

Buffers an event to the GUI manager's event queue, which will be processed by a call to Fooey_ProcessEvents().

Parameters:
pstManager_ - pointer to the GUI manager containing the controls to render
pstEvent_ - pointer to the event to queue. This is copied in, so the event need not be persistent.
Returns:
TRUE on successful buffering, FALSE on buffer full
